revised_title: Hydrogen Spectrum and New Lines in Calcium Spectrum
tldr: The author studied the spectrum of hydrogen using a Monkhoven tube and discovered new lines more refrangible than the h line. One of these lines coincided with a line observed in the spectrum of calcium at A, 3968'0 (H). The author also discussed the limitations of the Capillary Electroscope in measuring electromotive force and the need for more accurate measuring instruments.
